content: --अंकुश {%<ab>a.</ab>%} ‘not curbed by a hook’, unchecked, uncontrolled, unruly, independent, completely free, unfettered; निरंकुश इव द्विपः <ls>Bhāg.</ls>; कामो निकामनिरंकुशः <ls>Gīt. 7</ls>; निरंकुंशाः कवयः <ls>Sk.</ls>; <ls>Bh. 3. 105</ls>; <ls>Mv. 3. 39</ls>; विनयरुचयः सदैव निरंकुशाः <ls>Mu. 3. 6.</ls>
